name: Beekeeper (itch) (Mr. Kitkat)
description:
In this game, you are the doorkeeper of the bee hive! Make sure to open up for the brave worker bees, but don't hold it open too long or our honey might fall out!

Controls: As the door has many holes, you might need to open many doors at once.  The button layout is the same as the door layout, you will need 7 keys to open all the doors. They are as following: 

   W    E

A    S    D

   Z     X

This is an short arcade-ish experience, made in one day. Enjoy!
